feels.name: Determination
feels.quote: If I can't have it as I like, I don't care to have it at all.

hasObject.name: Arranging an artistic fÃªte for her friends

feels.name: Gratitude
feels.quote: If it hadn't been for mother I never should have got through.

feels.name: Anxiety
feels.quote: The lunch looked charmingly; and as she surveyed it, she sincerely hoped it would taste well.

feels.name: Defiance
feels.quote: Why in the world should you spend your money, worry your family, and turn the house upside down for a parcel of girls who don't care a sixpence for you?

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Amy's definition of Jo's idea of independence was such a good hit that both burst out laughing.

feels.name: Resignation
feels.quote: Very well, Amy; if your heart is set upon it, and you see your way through without too great an outlay of money, time, and temper, I'll say no more.

feels.name: Amusement
feels.quote: Mrs. March laughed, and smoothed down her maternal pride as she asked,--
